abstract: Argentine federal court dismisses charges against Pres Mauricio Macri, who was indicted in 2010, while mayor of Buenos Aires, for illegal wiretapping in connection with 1994 bombing of Jewish community center.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge dismissed charges that Mr. Macri participated in a wiretapping scheme that date to his tenure as the mayor of Buenos Aires.

headline.main: Mauricio Macri, Argentine President, Is Cleared of Wiretapping Charges
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Argentina: Case Against President Is Dismissed

snippet: A federal judge dismissed charges that Mr. Macri participated in a wiretapping scheme that date to his tenure as the mayor of Buenos Aires.

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
